originalText.text:
Had no idea how to transfer a photo from my Samsung notes to make a copy at the store.
I was at my wit ends, but God sent me an Angel.
By the name of "Felicity", at the copy section.
She not only guided me but actually did the entire process for me without any hesitation that l was occupying her busy schedule. So attentive to my desperate need of that flyer to be printed.
We need more employees to treat customers the proper way without shoveling us to the side as if we were occupying valuable  space.
God Bless her for the rest of her life .ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text: If you're thinking of printing anything other than regular paper JUST DON'T DO IT. The customer service at the printing section of this location is so horrible. Worst experience I've ever had at Staples. Treated all customers with condescending attitude and don't expect any help from them just a waste of money.

originalText.text: A friend of mine had an emergency Situation that we need to print out documents at Staples because her printer was malfunctioning. The girl that was working not only completely ignored us we ended up spending $30.00 for 12 pages of print. We will buy a printer. However, we not buy it at Staples.

originalText.text: This location is very unprofessional and unorganized. Iâ€™ve been standing in front on two employees for over 30 minutes and no one thought to ask me for help. The self serve printers do not take Apple Pay even though they have the Apple Pay sign. When I asked for assistance to print they acted as if there was nothing they could do, meanwhile they couldâ€™ve  just printed my documents and I pay at the register. Iâ€™m very displeased with my experience at this location. I do not recommend.
